Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>Great! There's just the little matter of
the entry fee.<sp:5:0:0> That'll be <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_3202:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble_00>Aw shucks. Now that I went through all
that, <sp:5:0:0>I've noticed you don't seem to be a
stable member yet.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This competition is for stable members
only...<sp:5:0:0>and members gotta have a <clr:0000>towing
harness<clr:ffff> at that.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>So first things first, sort out your
<clr:0000>membership registration<clr:ffff> at a stable.<sp:0:4:0>Then be sure you save up Pony Points,
trade 'em for a <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff>, and come
on back.
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Hold on a sec...<sp:5:1:0> It looks like
you can't use a towing harness with
that horse.
Sorry, but I can't let you run this race
like that. You best come back on a
different horse, you hear?
Talk_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble>You don't have the dough to race.<sp:5:1:0>
Come back when you've got <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>!
Talk_3203:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_00>About that new horsemanship challenge
I came up with...<sp:0:4:0>You gotta be a stable member to give
it a go.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>So if you'd like to take a run at my record,
head over to a stable and get yourself
<clr:0000>registered as a member<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Oh, and be sure to save up Pony Points
and trade 'em for a <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff>.
Come see me when you're ready.
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_01>Oops, sorry fella...<sp:5:0:0> You gotta equip a
<clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff> to take part in this race.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You can get a towing harness at the
stable. So save up your points, trade 'em
in, and then see about challenging me.
Talk_703:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>As promised, here's <clr:0000><sp:2:e:44:3e004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f0048006f0072007300650052006100630065005f004d006900640064006c006500520065007700610072006400ffff00cd> Pony Points<clr:ffff>.
You can stand up tall and take pride in
the fact you gave it a go.
Talk_1100:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughBad>Heh heh...<sp:5:0:0> I thought I'd be seeing you
again.<sp:5:0:0> Think you can beat my record?
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>First, we connect your horse to the trailer
like...<sp:5:1:0>this.

Next, we take a wooden box...<sp:5:0:0>and put it
on the cart...<sp:5:1:0> Alley-oop!

There we go.<sp:5:1:0> Everything's sorted.
Talk_704:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>As promised, here's <clr:0000><sp:2:e:42:3c004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f0048006f0072007300650052006100630065005f0047007200650061007400520065007700610072006400ffff00cd> Pony Points<clr:ffff>.
You can stand up tall and take pride in
the fact you gave it a go.
Talk_74:
Hoo-hee, I can't believe you're gonna give
it a run in your skivvies! Can't wait to see
the results!
Talk_80:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>Now then, time for me to do
some explainin'.
Talk_400:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Looks like you lost all your cargo!<sp:5:0:0> Better
come on back here.
Talk_10_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And what is this contest exactly?!<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy_00>Why, it's a race to see how fast you can
gallop around the course...<sp:5:0:0>without losing
the cargo off the horse's trailer!
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>See, you gotta do one lap around this
prairie, <sp:5:0:0>and you can't let the cargo fall
off the trailer along the way.
Talk_401:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>This contest isn't just about the speed of
the horse.<sp:5:1:0> You gotta control the reins so
the cargo doesn't fall off. That's the key!
Focus on speed too much, and your cargo
will be gone before you know it.
Talk_82:
There are <clr:0000><sp:2:e:4a:44004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f0048006f0072007300650052006100630065005f004e0075006d006f00660043006800650063006b0070006f0069006e007400ffff00cd><clr:ffff> <clr:0000>checkpoints<clr:ffff>, all told.<sp:5:0:0> And
you can't cross the finish line till you've
passed through every one of 'em.
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>Be warned, if the cargo falls off your
trailer...you fail.<sp:5:0:0> And no getting off your
horse during the race either.
Talk_90:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Want me to give you a rundown of
the rules?
Talk_86:
Do well, and there's Pony Points in it for
you.<sp:5:0:0> How many depends on your time.
Talk_92:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This contest puts your horsemanship skills
through their paces, see?<sp:5:1:0> If you want a
good time, you can't just tear through it.
Gotta keep tight control of your steed
so you don't drop what's on the cart.
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Trouble_00>Once you pay the <clr:0000>20 rupee<clr:ffff> entry fee,
you're locked in,<sp:5:1:0> so be real sure first.
Talk_87:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's it for the rules. Now then,<sp:5:0:0> you
ready to give it a go?
Talk_102: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Then get going!<sp:5:0:0> This is no time to dawdle!
Talk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That so? What a shame. Just let me know
if you want to give it a go another time.
Talk_420:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>You can't finish the race on foot, you
clodhopper!<sp:5:1:0> I'm shuttin' it down.
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Then what're you doing here? You're not
gonna break my record lollygaggin' about
like this!
Talk_421:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>What's the big idea? <sp:5:0:0>This horse race
doesn't work if you're not on a horse!<sp:5:1:0>
Stay put till you cross the finish line.
Talk_800: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Wanna keep at it and try again?
Talk_1200:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How about it? Wanna see if you got
what it takes again?
Talk_810:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>You reckon you can do even better?<sp:5:1:0>
Your enthusiasm is downright inspiring!
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>All that being said, I've had to put the
race on hold on account of this foul
weather we're having.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But once the rain lets up, it's back on!
So come see if you can't beat my
record then.
Talk_820:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, thanks for today!<sp:5:0:0> It was a pleasure
to see you and your horse run.

Consider giving it a go again when the
mood strikes.
Talk_510:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Well, color me confounded!<sp:5:1:0> You beat
my record!

And the way you rode...<sp:5:0:0>it was like you
and that horse were one and the same.
I've never seen anything like it!
Talk_200:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Where do you think you're goin'? The
race is on!<sp:5:0:0> Get back here!
Talk_451:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Uh-oh...<sp:5:0:0> Looks like your trailer's come
unhitched!<sp:5:1:0> Come back this way!
Talk_201:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You'll never finish the race if you veer off
course!<sp:5:0:0> Just get through the checkpoints
proper-like, and then get back here.
Talk_452:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>To get a trailer unhitched like that...<sp:5:0:0>
You must've been running reckless.

Hate to say it, but you can't carry cargo
like this...so I have to disqualify you.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Next time, make sure you run steady as
can be. Riding reckless won't win ya
any records.
Talk_453:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Uh-oh...<sp:5:0:0>looks like your load is damaged!<sp:5:1:0>
Come on back this way.
Talk_830:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Brush up on your skills, and take another
run at it sometime, will ya?
Talk_10_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>In fact, if you fancy yourself skilled in the
horsemanship department, why not take a
run at my record?
Talk_454:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>You went and let your cargo get
damaged?<sp:5:0:0> What's the big idea?

You can't finish this here contest if you
can't keep your cargo in one piece. I've
got no choice but to disqualify you.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now, go break that record! Just be sure
to keep your load in good condition, OK?
Talk_520:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Whoa, now...<sp:5:0:0> That was pretty impressive!<sp:5:0:0>
You're not too far off my own record.

You'll blow clean past it if I'm not careful.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>You a nomad?<sp:5:0:0> S'pose you've already
seen the horses round the Faron
Grasslands, then?
Well, I grew up taming those horses,<sp:5:0:0> and
I've polished my ridin' skills till they shine.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>In fact, I'm sure there's nobody better'n
me. <sp:5:0:0>But these days, putting my ridin'
skills to the test isn't enough.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, being the horse enthusiast I am,
I've come up with a contest guaranteed
to push me even farther.
Talk_455:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Hey now,<sp:5:0:0> looks like that trailer of yours is
broken!<sp:5:1:0> Better come on back here.
Talk_2200:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Admiration_00>You still don't miss a trick, do you?<sp:5:1:0>
Looks like I won't be beating you
anytime soon.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>In this new test of horsemanship skills I've
come up with, riders gotta pull a trailer
while competing for the fastest time.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Whaddaya say? <sp:5:1:0>You got the grit to step
up and challenge the master?
Talk_456:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_01>Went and broke your trailer, eh?<sp:5:0:0> How's
that workin' out for ya?

Can't finish this here contest without a
working trailer. Hate to say it, but I've got
to disqualify you.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Next time you try to break the record,
just be sure to keep that thing in one
piece, OK?
Talk_522:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That was a real good run!<sp:5:1:0> Looked like the
horse felt good about it too.
Talk_523:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well done!<sp:5:0:0> That was a pretty good time.<sp:5:1:0>
Way you rode, I know you're gonna get up
to good things on the next run you take.
Talk_530:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>Hmm...is that all you got in ya?<sp:5:0:0> You won't
be unseating my record that way.

Or maybe you just weren't in the mood to
show off your real riding skills...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Either way, if I were you, I'd convince that
horse of yours to pick up the pace. Might
get a better time that way.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Do well, and there'll be some Pony Points
in it for you.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>How about it? You think you got what
it takes?
Talk_533:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Of course, ya did break your own record,<sp:5:0:0>
so your skills are improving!
Talk_3100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>I'm in no mood to run the course when
it's raining. And the horses don't much
like it either.
If you want to give this contest of mine
a go, come back when the sun's out.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The challenge here is to go as fast as
you can without letting the cargo fall off
the trailer.<sp:5:0:0>
The course takes you one lap around the
Faron Grasslands.<sp:5:0:0> And don't go trying to
enjoy the sights!
You gotta get through the <clr:0000><sp:2:e:4a:44004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f0048006f0072007300650052006100630065005f004e0075006d006f00660043006800650063006b0070006f0069006e007400ffff00cd> <sp:c9:6:30:140063006800650063006b0070006f0069006e007400160063006800650063006b0070006f0069006e00740073000000><clr:ffff>
and across the finish line as fast as
you can.
Talk_534:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And ya also broke your own record.<sp:5:1:0>
So good for you!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkDeny_00>I thought you had harder bark on you
than that.<sp:5:0:0> Well, you ever change your
mind, come back and see me.
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey there, you're back. Wanna try to beat
my time again?
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>Well shoot, fella. You can't enter a horse
race without a horse to ride!

Go mount up, and come back to me when
you're serious.
Talk_300: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Time's up already, fella!<sp:5:0:0> Come on back!
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Admiration_00>Ah... <sp:5:0:0>Brought that horse here so you
could take part in a certain race, did you?
Talk_301:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Something eating you?<sp:5:0:0> You'll need a full
attitude adjustment to beat me!
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You've got a towing harness as well.
All right, looks like we're all set to go!
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Just double-checking...<sp:5:0:0> You do want to
challenge my record, don't you?
Talk_614:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>How 'bout that! You got about the same
score as I did!

You and your horse are gonna have to
be of one mind if you're gonna beat
this time!
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Trouble_00>That horse you're riding,<sp:5:0:0> it isn't properly
<clr:0000>registered<clr:ffff> yet.

Go take care of the paperwork at the
stable counter before you try to beat
my best time.
Talk_615:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Well now, you didn't beat this horseman
at his own game.

But don't go feeling sore about it.<sp:5:1:0>
You're just green at this, and there's
no shame in that.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Besides, it won't be long before you've
got experience under your belt.<sp:5:0:0> Then
you'll be the one setting records.
Will you look at that! I think I'm starting to
take a shine to you.
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_01>See here...<sp:5:1:0> This is a HORSE race.<sp:0:4:0>If you want in, you gotta be on a horse.
Not...whatever this ride of yours is.
Talk_11_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey now, we meet again.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe you've
seen the horses that live around the
Faron Grasslands?
Talk_3200:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Nothing's worse than a slippery saddle.<sp:5:0:0>
Plus the stuff on the trailer will get wet.

Bet you were lookin' to beat my record.
Don't you worry. Just come back when
the rain lets up.
